Name: BatchPoolIdentity
SummaryComment: The identity of the Batch pool, if configured.

Key.Name: Type
Key.SummaryComment: The identity of the Batch pool, if configured.
Key.RemarksComment: The list of user identities associated with the Batch pool. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

Key.Name: UserAssignedIdentities
Key.SummaryComment: The list of user identities associated with the Batch account.
Key.RemarksComment: The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.
